1.10.2.0.0.7.0:
Change: Main Version now is 1.10.2
Fix: State-aware TESRs should not crash the game anymore
1.10.2.0.0.8.0:
Addition: Hammer that can be used to get the output of a repair operation on the anvil
Addition: Naming an item on the anvil now displays a cursor
Addition: Individual selection boxes for all slots in all blocks apart from the enchantment table
Change: Anvil output no longer is displayed in favor of a hammer slot
Change: Naming an item on the anvil now defaults to the item's current name, mimicking Vanilla behavior
Change: Items now appear flat on the crafting table and it was reduced in height for easier access
Fix: Middle-clicking and breaking the Furnace now selects the immersive variant
1.10.2.0.0.9.0:
Addition: Immersive version of the beacon that is interacted with by enabling and edit mode through right clicking and then scrolling
Change: Hammers now are iron tools and take damage on use
Fix: The book on enchantment tables is now correctly textured

1.12.1.1.0.0:
Change: Update to Minecraft 1.12
Change: Blocks no longer are separate from their Vanilla counterparts but replace them completely
Change: Removed conversion unnecessary recipes
1.12.1.1.0.1: Fix: Switch to CurseForge Maven for Forgelin dependency
1.12.1.1.0.2: Fix: Switch to newer CurseGradle version
1.12.1.1.1.0:
Addition: Configuration options to disable immersive variants selectively
Change: The crafting table no longer uses metadata for storing its facing but the TileEntity
1.12.1.1.2.0:
Addition: Acquiring an iron block or the anvil recipe will now unlock the hammer recipe
Change: Update to latest Forge (14.21.1.2400)
Fix: Fix hopper extraction crashing due to fake player networking
Fix: Fix crafting table interaction not working with special items like buckets
1.12.1.1.2.1:
Change: Crafting handler uses the proper facilities for cancelling the events now
Fix: Mod now usable on servers, still requires a fix from Forge, though
1.12.1.1.2.2: Fix: Hammer model registers properly now, removes conflicts with other (buggy) mods
1.12.1.1.2.3: Fix: Properly include version information in main class
1.12.1.1.2.4:
Fix: Prevent arbitrary chunk generation through the server
Fix: Don't depend on a version of Forgelin, just the mod
1.12.2.0.0.0:
Change: Automatic extraction out of the crafting table no longer works, since automation and players were too indistinguishable code-wise. Insertion still works.
Fix: Furnace uses Vanilla methods to ensure items don't drop on state changes now, fixes issues with external heater etc.
Fix: Anvil doesn't ignore its empty state anymore
1.12.2.0.1.0:
Change: Properly depend on versioned Forgelin
Change: Updated to newest Forge, addresses most issues with VI on servers
Change: Override use of Vanilla state mappers with custom ones to prevent issues with resource packs

1.9.4.0.0.1.0:
Fix: Crafting Table now respects changing output while automating
Fix: Enchantment table interaction won't trigger hovered blocks anymore
Fix: All automatable blocks don't crash your game with an NPE anymore
1.9.4.0.0.1.1: Fix: Game is now runnable in an obfuscated environment again
1.9.4.0.0.2.0:
Addition: Shapeless crafting recipes to convert from Vanilla to immersive blocks and vice-versa
Fix: Crafting table changes output again if there already was one but the recipe is different
1.9.4.0.0.3.0:
Addition: JEI Integration with recipe transfer for the crafting table
Change: Minimum required Forge version now is 12.17.0.1910
Fix: Furnace should now get properly lit when surrounded by other blocks
Fix: Furnace now properly synchronises to the client when items are inserted manually
1.9.4.0.0.3.1: Fix: The mod no longer ships JEI now
1.9.4.0.0.4.0:
Change: Furnace respects sneaking now, one item from the stack is inserted by default, the whole stack when sneaking
Change: Crafting Table now only consumes one item at a time rather than the whole stack without sneaking
Fix(es): The Crafting Table should now properly cancel all placing of blocks or other item uses
1.9.4.0.0.5.0:
Addition: Immersive Brewing Stand - Interaction should be fairly self-explanatory
Fix(es): Any previous interaction issues with the enchantment table should be resolved now
1.9.4.0.0.5.1: Fix: The enchantment table should actually be usable now
1.9.4.0.0.6.0:
Addition: Configuration options for various things, check out the config GUI
Change: The brewing stand respects shift clicking (sneaking) now
